faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about SmartPet Tag.

updateInfo.question: How do I update my pet's information?
updateInfo.answer: Simply log in to your SmartPet Tag account and update your pet's profile. Changes are instant and will be immediately available when someone scans your pet's tag.

waterproof.question: Is the SmartPet Tag waterproof?
waterproof.answer: Yes! Our tags are completely waterproof and designed to withstand all weather conditions and active pet lifestyles.

foundPet.question: What happens if someone finds my pet?
foundPet.answer: When someone scans your pet's tag, they'll see your pet's profile with the contact information you've chosen to display. You'll receive an instant notification with their location.

smartphone.question: Do I need a smartphone to use SmartPet Tag?
smartphone.answer: While a smartphone makes it easier to manage your pet's profile, anyone with any device that can scan QR codes or read NFC tags can access your pet's information in an emergency.

damaged.question: What if the tag gets damaged or lost?
damaged.answer: We offer a one-time free replacement within the first year. After that, you can easily order a replacement tag and transfer your pet's profile to the new tag.

security.question: Is my pet's information secure?
security.answer: Yes! You control exactly what information is visible to the public. Sensitive details are encrypted and protected by bank-level security.
